topics.body:
What am I even doing?

Why am I watching Dusk's Dawn right now?
WHY DOES DUSK'S DAWN EXIST?
_WHY AM I EVEN WATCHING THIS IN THE FIRST PLACE?_

Boy, this thing does seem like the MLP equivalent of The Room. It's that gloriously terrible, and my brain is hurting me right now. It's probably because my brain cannot process the amount of stupid and terrible I see before me, and I'm a guy who can enjoy watching the Bayformers movies!
